text: The Phenix City Story is a 1955 American crime movie directed by Phil Karlson and starring John McIntire, Richard Kiley, Kathryn Grant, Edward Andrews, James Edwards, Lenka Peterson, Biff McGuire, Jean Carson, Helen Martin. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1955 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies directed by Phil Karlson Category:Movies set in Alabama Category:Political movies Category:Movies set in the 1950s
title: The Phenix City Story
